update tbl_orders
initorderid = #{initorderid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USERID = #{USERID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME = #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{SEX,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDRESS = #{ADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{POSTCODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{PHONE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DELIVERYFEE = #{DELIVERYFEE,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

CREATEDATE = #{CREATEDATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{STATUS,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BILLINGWAY = #{BILLINGWAY,jdbcType=INTEGER},

zone = #{zone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sendway = #{sendway,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payway = #{payway,jdbcType=INTEGER},
commissioncharge = #{commissioncharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
insurance = #{insurance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
need_invoice = #{need_invoice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bill_to_address = #{bill_to_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jylsh = #{jylsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

paycompno = #{paycompno,jdbcType=INTEGER},

trainunit = #{trainunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
projbrief = #{projbrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDERID = #{ORDERID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
